items.sentence: I'm beginning to believe we'll never be able to convince Tom that he's wrong.
I'm beginning to believe that we'll never be able to convince Tom he's wrong.
Tom believes Mary made a big mistake when she sold her father's Stradivarius.
Everyone on the swim team got a tiny dolphin tattooed on their left shoulder.
Tom was a lifeguard at the swimming pool near my house when I was growing up.
